definition: liable to sudden unpredictable change

definition: European perennial weedy plant with greenish flowers

definition: of or containing mercury

definition: of or containing mercury

definition: a tasteless colorless powder used medicinally as a cathartic

name: Mercury

definition: the smallest planet and the nearest to the sun
name: Mercury

definition: a heavy silvery toxic univalent and bivalent metallic element; the only metal that is liquid at ordinary temperatures
name: mercury

definition: temperature measured by a mercury thermometer

definition: a white poisonous soluble crystalline sublimate of mercury; used as a pesticide or antiseptic or wood preservative
